desc: Sport Specs & Opticals: Huge selection of eyewear & designer frames in Toronto - sunglasses, sports eyewear and goggles, kids eyewear, eyeglass frames, prescription glasses, reading glasses, screen readers, contact lenses, eye drops for dry eyes, eyelid and eyelash care. Free shipping across Canada available.
